Blog.post: wtf... twin tests tomolo... physics and geog... HOWHOWHOW!?!?!?!?!? arg... teachers ***(in case any teachers see this, hehe) haiz... and how the heck am i supposed to handle this shit??? studying the shit on refraction and reflection now...
yeah... survived the test barage at last!!! erm... but the results are alittle depressing... a1 for maths, but c5 for chinese and b3 for chem... not very optimistic...
walao... today sux... have to do lots of filing and stuff... muscle aches all over the place, and most of all, HOMEWORK, MRP!!! SUX...

walao... my end of term sabbatical sux... wtf.... so called improving sports performance course... my foot. more like training not to sleep during PE teacher's lecture... wats more, PE chers dunno how to teach. haf to go thru one whole week of boredom and torture... tsktsktsk...

yeah... maths test coming... haha so lucky, an excuse to keep down the amt of homework... oh yeah, what do girls think of chs bois??? haha, discussed this on assembly... walao, y so explicit one??? oh yeah, juz spotted a stupid ******* aes judoka staying near me. to be exact, in my junior's block... WOW, 3 judokas in two blocks, in close proximity... SJF is surely accomplishing its goal halfway...
sian... sorry har, so long nvr post liao... twisted my neck, ouchie... hah, went to the URA today, sian, talking kok... onli do sight-seeing. stupid excursion...

oh my... tomolo haf chem test... omg, salts and solutions... sian, still haf to pay for alot of things... like competition and class fund... haha, class and judo treasurer very pissed cauz i m delaying for time... on the bright side, scored a1 for maths test... haiyo, more than half the class got a, haha... easier than i expected... and the best thing is, i can resist the urge to pon maths quiz training... the 1st time i went for that since 3 weeks... hahaha... slack hor? oh yeah, todae's assembly was funny... people suddenly very well behaved cauz st nic girls were there on exchange program...
sian... i hate today... at school, forgot to bring this and that... when i reached home, parents start getting unreasonably pissed... wonder wats wrong wif everyone at home today...

haiz... so boring, almost broke my toes today cauz i landed on my front... now suffering from the after effects... SO PAINFUL... combined wif bruises and a stupid wound on my shin... dun feel like training tomolo... cant even walk properly lor... there r several great things bout today though... managed to avoid getting thrown by seniors, and getting a a1 for chem... best of all, no homework!!! YAY!!! the only weekend without homework since jan...
GRRR... my toe is swollen and aching AGAIN... should i go for judo school training tomolo??? tired and wounds all over the body leh... good news... my msg is estimated to be 2.8 this term... YEAH...

twin tests tomolo... haiz... core and physics... good luck for ourselves... wonder wat to study more and which to "HECK CARE!!!"... sian............................. today zijing went home early cauz of a fever... and i haf a cough... man, the weather is indeed bad... so hot, yet it was raining juz now... so many ppl getting sick these few days... heard tt china sars comin baq... worrying siah... anyway, went to weixiang's mom's funeral juz now... feel so sorry for wax... haiz... lets hope he can be strong and handle the blow...

YAY, juz returned from camp... so sian, someone koped my whole plastic bag of clothes. GRR, lucky all other thingys are fine... however my mom is very pissed cauz my shoes are so dirty. haha, 3 shoes to wash man. hah, say a wonderful nite scene the few previous nitez at the camp. saw PLENTY of stars in the skies. oh yeah, suffered from seasickness the few days back during kayaking. so bad man, cant enjoy the camp. well, had our 1st online match wif thomas, fun. massive strike against comp's nuke turned out to be the strike that blasted its base. multiple front strikes killed 3 enemies in a row. well, have to finish all my homework tomolo, although theres no training. haiz...

sian... today's weights training is a little too crazy... nearly injured my wrists... cauz the old injury acted up again. anyw, heard some sec 4 or 3 boys from chs cracked dirty jokes in front of some rgs girls... woah, so bold... heard they sent an apology to rgs... GRRR... so angry abt my parents... they nvr respect my privacy lor... opened my sms everytime they see my fone vibrate. so angry... and they were still shouting at me for toking abt "repecting my privacy"... not onli smses, but sometimes they also read my letters, and reply to my smses... GRRR!!! I M MAD!!! sian, very tired leh, dunno wats the reason. partly due to chem lesson methinks... the stupid orbital concept introduced... madness, we are in sec 3 and they are forcing j1 stuff into our tiny heads... a huge contrast from the past two slack days... haha, but tts how school is... good thing to note... olympics approaching... yeah, hope to see judo being aired...

wow... today is not bad too... slacking the whole day long, especially for english lesson. best man, triple period for maths turns out to be a stupid lesson on moral implications of gambling... so called lesson on probability. anyw, fun, the mr ang, our maths olympiad teacher in charge was sick, so released us quite early... in fact, half an hour before normal. COOL! if not, wont feel like buying jolin's mv for jiaqi... killed too many brain cells during the 4 hours of maths todae... worrying about rising financial demands... judo camp, orange belt gradin, national judo champioships all coming in june... oh man, all demands money... start saving now or good luck for me. lucky gaobin called up and said his father had a job for me again for june. so, i think i haf to be a telephone salesman to for the entire month of june... haiz, its either like tat, or no money. well, on the bright side, my results haf improved from last term. lucky...

oh yeah, today ROX!!! found out that my weakest 2 subjects, core and english scored a2 and a1 respectively... call it hardwork or luck or cheating or watever u wish... haha, but who cares how i got tt? i am sooooo belated... best of all... double free period. kewl, 2 teachers nvr come means FUN!!! haha, listening to discman when the relieve cher was toking shit. lol... well, thomas and i did something stupid... changing our msn font, nic, and display pic to the same... tried confusing ppl like gaobin and several others... ", haha, sounds a little lame but who cares? hope tomolo can be as fun as today...

yay, today's pt is fun though its alittle tough... sian, how come maths quiz training has to be cancelled?!?!?! tomolo haf to go for endurance training... sian... nvm, look on the bright side, holis approaching... time for me to reorganise my entire workload and timetable...

oh my god... today is bad... juz got back my mrp, and scored 12.5/40... MAN!!! humanities sure die le for this year... lucky i found my chem assignment wif my fren today... stupid bastard, took my assignment thruout the whole weekend and didnt rmb it until todae morning... GRRR sian, tomolo is training again... and lucky this week's maths quiz training is cancelled... good, more time for me to practise for orange belt kata...

hmm... the past few days were quite fun but tough... judo camp siah. good news and bad news... found out that my tomoe nage works... haha, works better than last time. but hor, ONLI my tomoenage can work... shit, all my other throws suck. well, my kata for orange belt is improving. at least i can remain standing after doing kouchi and ouchi gari... blushes... yesterday terence broke his wrist... see lah? playful boy... dunno how his parents are going to blast him... oh yeah, so this year c boys lightweight onli left wif nicholas??? but on the bright side, i can train wif nic again... yeah tomolo is SMO already... haiz, sian... bb, going to look around explore nus already, else tomolo would be alittle lost...

wtf... had a bad training juz now... sian, dunno y, my neck and elbows keep having this irritating ache... dun dare to meng the opponent... haha... play tomoe nage wif my yong feng... bof of us keep trying tomoe...

stupid shit... my techniques all suck now... dunno how to improve... walao... well, had a stupid botak head now... look like a bullet head u noe... lucky theres a flip side to everything... at least i dun need t dry my hair after a bath... haha, and its cooling...

yo, today is quite ok... went bowling wif some frenz... fun... at least can hit MORE pins down now... haha... sian, very pissed now... cauz my mom lor... i dunno wats wrong wif her... always haf mood swings like tat... ppl nvr hear the hp's ringtone she also pissed... grrr... y cant my mom be more like others? give me more freedom? ppl's parents think tat joining national team for training is an honor... not my mom... haiz... well, too bad lah... since my life is such a mess...

today is such a bad day... got a terrible neck ache... i think its cauz of the national judo last sunday... kena morote and head rammed to the ground wat... so now, trying to twist and my head like mad liddat... todae heard something surprising--velden asked me if we are allowed to change ep3 in sec 4... guess he wanna quit judo... aiyo...

national team??? haiz... my parents were arguing with me over whether to join national team training anot... wats wrong??? i can cope with my studies... i dun see anything wrong with goin for national team training... y cant they understand???

dunno wat to say... juz returned home from competition... yesterday had grading till very late, so nvr blog... yeah, orange belt finally... a better colour to look at compared to yellow... haha... juz now i was damn fucked up... the 1st few natches were fine... but last match against ong wei long of hs sux... kena morote seoinage like siao... fuck him... armlock me till my arm is still aching now. so... now haf silver medal... so, should i go national team anot??? they asked me to go, but i am worried about tough training, no time for homework, injury, so on... sian... hope someone can give me some helpful advice...

HAIZ!!! now not juz a cough... the phlegm is getting out of hand... irritating... BLOCKED NOSE!!! oh yeah, saw soo huey at e food court today... oh man, forgot to brnig along my cap... sure something for her to laugh about...

so sian... cough, sore throat, flu... 3 in 1... nnvr pt... juz sit there and watch... lucky dun haf fever, but the sore throat is getting out of hand... it aches even when i yawn... cant shout, cant laugh, cant tok... wat a torture...
lucky nvr kena fever... however, i m feeling damn irritated by the sore throat... hmm... nothing much interesting today... juz realised i had to study for chinese test... uh oh...

juz watched harry potter and e prisoner of azkaban juz now... arg... ate too much junk food... feeling feverish now... uh oh, hope i dun get sick tomolo... wow... the three main casts are getting real cute... feeling damn tired...

so mani days nvr post liao... no time man... keep doing homework... haiz... these few days r quite uneventful, except tt i discovered haf to do a stupid research on any asean country... stupid work...

oh man... term starts liao... bad man, alot of homework to rush thru even though i finished all my holiday homework, unlike my classmates. well, luckily i m not like em, else now they are having a terrible time coping... haha, so haf more time to do ACE... sian, no time for games. oh yeah, heard something about humanities nite coming this thurs... so wont be online. walao, eat away my free time... at nite somemore, until 9+... next day got training leh, still want to kill us izzit... haha..
watched spiderman 2 at lot one juz now... wow, cool movie... sian, school starts tomolo again... anyw, i m doing the stupid mrp and chem ace, cauz desperate for points liao... term 3...

hmmm, almost done all my homework and phew, theres another holiday tomolo. oh man, i dunno how to do mrp, and nationals schools judo is approaching... no time man, how??? anyw, might be able to handle with a little help...

hmmm, national schools judo finally over. A boys and girls scored silver and bronze, B and C boys gold, B girls silver, and C girls bronze... haiz, very discouraging results, wif onli 2 out of 6 golds... lucky both golds are CHS ones... hehe today had elections man, and walao, kena sabo and they nominated me for capt. feel so bad man, niaoed by them... haiz, i m postless, but nvm, judo is the main thing... as long as i can be a good player, hmm, maybe not having any posts is alrite... PHEW, mrp completed, chem ACE done but yet to hand in... chinese, geog and chem tests imminent...

sian man... mrp madness... everyone is going to die from it... nvm, at least i completed my DRAFT... anyw, so lOOOOng nvr blog already... too sian to blog, cauz no time man... national schools comin... sux, so scared man, nanyang lost C and A division already... scored bronze... walao, nic and jinghan lost to aes last week... hope they wont make the same mistake this thurs... LONG LIVE CHS JUDO!

haiz... today in a bad mood... juz becauz i didnt go wif thomas and velden to cineleisure... then they sorta become very cold towards me... dun they realise its very awkard for me to be wif them when i m not even a committee member? i dun want to be viewed as an extra... anyw, bought jay chou's new album... sian. nothing to do...
sian... today got a bad sore throat... haiz, lets hope it recovers by tomolo... anyways... english common test over... so, wats next on my list ah? IH1, IH2, maths, physics and chem incoming... sian!

changed my fone last week, cauz my 8250 was screwed up badly... sian man, yesterday went to help out at tang's judo sch, and today dunno y sore throat... found out that taekwondo ppl realli haf lots of power... hm, and they learn fast... anyw, drank so much water today... at least drank 6 nike bottles worth of water...

JUDGEMENT DAY!!! sian... tomolo is judgement day... for this term actually... two days in a day??? siao man, friday 13th still want to give us tests... IH2 hist and stupid physics... sucks, haf to go study liao... haiz... now nukezone for us today... today is very uneventful, juz tat i scored 70% for chinese compo... yay... oh yeah, asean test is over... at least theres less pressure now... shit man, chem worksheet nvr hand in, this term's conduct sure not excellent liao... hmm, nvm abt that... juz now saw min min on e bus... heard her moan about 3 tests today and two more tomolo... phew, lucky chs boys noe how to complain when there are too many tests...

sian man, today was weights training, but i forgot to bring my pe attire.. so juz sit there and stare at blank space for one plus hour. well, tomolo is the stupid ih1 test, asean... die, cheong so lag, give us one whole ****ing chunk of notes at the eleventh hour... HOW?!?!? shes nuts, lesson always tok kok, now online notes also so lag... on friday is chem and ih2, cold war... uh oh, the juz reminded me that this coming friday is the 13th... uh oh, bad luck for our tests??? oh yeah, jay chou's new album rox... went crazy trying to keep up wif his pace... wah... yesterday had a crazy time msging charmaine... i think from afternoon all the way till 930pm or something liddat...

last two days i was away from home cauz i had to go for the cip and hence stayed in sch for the nite... haiz... bad man. grad nite tt day ah, so funny... alot of cute performances by the seniors and juniors alike... hmmm, velden, thomas, vernon and i did the funky chicken dance again... even after 3 years of that same thingy, wonder y ppl still dun get bored of it. :) haiz, but after the grad nite thingy ah, i feel very guai4... dunno y, i suddenly feel very guilty abt myself... nvm, i shant tok about it liao... else feel bad again... last nite stayed in the space (ispark room) and watched the exorcist... how come they said its a disturbing movie??? i feel that its more like an ancient version of star wars or star trek or something liddat... they said its disgusting... ???? but the stupid movie made us cant sleep until it ended. so, we slept abt 2 hours onli lor... sian lucky today we went for cip then go cycling after tat... oh man, velden made fun of me... its so seiorus until i kena rammed several times then thrown off the bike several times... haha, now super tired. oh yeah, vernon rammed into some little girl or boy and the parents were super pissed... want him to pay medical expenses... he rammed her at full speed man... tat bastard... dunno how to control his speed... hmm, at least cycling made me forget abt the guilt for some time...
